name: mayoral
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
of or relating to a mayor (= a person elected or chosen to lead a town or its local government): mayoral duties He won the election by the largest majority ever given to a mayoral candidate. See
mayor
More examplesFewer examplesShe won the mayoral election by more than 1,000 votes. He ran in Chicago's mayoral race and for the U. S. presidency.It was the most expensive mayoral campaign in U. S. history.
